## UtilitiesService.downloadFile() method

Download File Download a \_small\_ file from a NERSC system.

- \*\*machine\*\*: the name of the machine to use - \*\*path\*\*: the remote path of the file - \*\*binary\*\*: (optional) If true the file will be returned base64-encoded

**Signature:**

```typescript
downloadFile(machine: PublicHost, path: string, binary?: boolean): CancelablePromise<FileDownload>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  machine | [PublicHost](./sfapi.publichost.md) |  |
|  path | string |  |
|  binary | boolean | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./sfapi.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[FileDownload](./sfapi.filedownload.md)<!-- -->&gt;

FileDownload Successful Response
